Love all the couch torrent experts who still seem to think that the song "the Bear and Maiden Fair" is a joke by eztv... some nefarious plot to ruin our Game of Thrones experience.

SONG AT END=
The song is the "Bear and the Maiden Fair." The lyrics are in the book, A Song of Ice and Fire by GRRM. It is performed in a punk rock fashion that makes it seem out of place, but it is 100% Westerosi in origin. It was not added by some moron for a good laugh.

It should not, however, be playing at the most important part of the drama as Jaime is sitting down to have an important conversation at the diner table. That was an error, which this torrent is supposed to fix.

First time the music played thought some pop up somewhere had sprung into life. Second time I was dismayed then realised lyrics were the same as the song near the start and that something must have gone wrong. When I realised the source, the source I trust most on TPB, this confirmed it was mere glitch. I hope this torrent fixes the glitch. And also, to all those willing to burn eztv, and never downlowad again, go ahead. Less of you fucking leechers to trouble our thoughts. :)
